The Atlantic Current: Mapping the Virgins of Guadalupe and Remedios

Dona Maria, Almeria, Andalucia

Katherine Dau

Verified

Doña María holds a festival to the Virgen de los Remedios and St. Teresa from October 12-15 each year.

Works cited

  1. “Doña María,” Wikipedia.
  2. LÓPEZ, Norberto. “Santa Teresa y la Virgen de los Remedios brillan en Doña María” Diario de Almería, October 14, 2013
